problem_text: Figure shows an arrangement of three particles, particle 1 of mass $m_1=6.0 \mathrm{~kg}$ and particles 2 and 3 of mass $m_2=$ $m_3=4.0 \mathrm{~kg}$, and distance $a=2.0 \mathrm{~cm}$. What is the net gravitational force $\vec{F}_{1, \text { net }}$ on particle 1 due to the other particles?
